Technical agitator at Apside, Christophe preaches good practices on various IT projects and universities in the Touraine region. Converted to computer science 15 years ago after a doctorate in neurobiology, he actively contributes to Java communities by having been co-responsible for the Java section of the developpez.com site but also by participating in conferences and having founded the JUG Towers in 2008.
